events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a rear-end collision that occurred on the highway around 8:30 AM.
The claim was reviewed and classified under Auto Accident due to vehicle collision damage reported by the claimant.
An insurance agent has been assigned to assist the customer through the claim process and manage communication.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and confirmed that the investigation will begin shortly.
Request sent to customer for police report and photos of the vehicle damage to support the investigation.
Customer has submitted the police accident report and detailed photographs of the rear-end damage on the vehicle.
The insurance investigation team began evaluating the claim, reviewing submitted evidence and accident details.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of liability and assessment of damage costs for claim settlement.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering vehicle repair costs and associated expenses.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the proposed resolution.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance provider, authorizing payment for the approved settlement amount.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s designated account covering the full agreed settlement for vehicle repairs.
The claim has been formally closed following successful payment and confirmation that repairs are underway.
All claim files and documents have been archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
